infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: BottleUp needs access to your camera to take photos of receipts and orders.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: BottleUp needs access to your photo library to select images for orders and receipts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: BottleUp needs permission to save order confirmations and receipts to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: BottleUp needs access to your microphone for video messages and support.
